item.title: Client crashing command,help me please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i made this command to automatically change emotes every 12 seconds and instead of doing the emote it casues the client to crash and i have to restart the client so could someone figure out what i did wrong with this loop\

if (command.startsWith("test emote")) {
for(int emote = 1; emote > 0; emote++)  { 
if(waiter == 0)  {
startAnimation(emote); 
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true; 
waiter = 25;
} } }

heres the int waiter

public int waiter = 0;

and heres whats in public boolean process

if (waiter > 0) {
		waiter -= 1;
		}

waiter is a timer that waits for the next time the emotes gonna happen and emote is the emote id that its gonna do

so could someone fix it for me i tried and it still crashes and wont do a single emote 

              thanks,
                          blitz_9100 :)

Read full topic
